audioText: Le chat noir sortait souvent la nuit et sautait dessus le toit de la maison.
question: Where did the black cat jump at night?
options: On top of the house roof
explanation: The text states 'Le chat noir sortait souvent la nuit et sautait dessus le toit de la maison' - The black cat would often go out at night and jump on top of the house roof. 'Sortait' is the imperfect form of 'sortir' (to go out), 'dessus' means 'on top of', and 'noir' describes the cat's color.
